statements: SELECT * FROM employee_concerns WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_id, concern FROM employee_concerns ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, concern FROM employee_concerns WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_concerns WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_concerns WHERE concern LIKE '%harassment%'
SELECT * FROM employee_concerns WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, employee_id, concern FROM employee_concerns ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT employee_id, concern, status FROM employee_concerns WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_concerns WHERE concern LIKE '%harassment%';
SELECT id, concern, created_at FROM employee_concerns WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_id, concern FROM alerts WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT alert_id, employee_id, timestamp FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT concern, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY concern;
SELECT a.alert_id, a.concern, b.acknowledgement_status FROM alerts a JOIN acknowledgements b ON a.alert_id = b.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT concern, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE employee_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, concern, acknowledgement_status FROM alerts JOIN acknowledgements ON alerts.alert_id = acknowledgements.alert_id WHERE acknowledgement_status = true;

SELECT alert_id, concern, acknowledgement_timestamp FROM alerts JOIN acknowledgements ON alerts.alert_id = acknowledgements.alert_id WHERE acknowledgement_status = false ORDER BY acknowledgement_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM alerts;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeConcerns;
SELECT employee_id,concern_text FROM EmployeeConcerns WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT concern_id, timestamp, concern_text FROM EmployeeConcerns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_id = 3;
SELECT alert_message, concern_id FROM Alerts INNER JOIN EmployeeAcknowledgements ON Alerts.concern_id = EmployeeAcknowledgements.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeConcerns;
SELECT concern_text, timestamp FROM EmployeeConcerns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE acknowledged = true;
SELECT acknowledgment_id, alert_message FROM Alerts JOIN EmployeeAcknowledgements ON Alerts.alert_id = EmployeeAcknowledgements.alert_id;

SELECT EmployeeAcknowledgements.employee_id, concern_text FROM EmployeeConcerns JOIN EmployeeAcknowledgements ON EmployeeConcerns.concern_id = Alerts.concern_id ORDER BY EmployeeAcknowledgements.acknowledged_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_name, email FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(employee_id) AS max_id FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, email FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT concern_text, alert_message FROM Concern INNER JOIN Alert ON Concern.concern_id = Alert.concern_id;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM Acknowledgement ORDER BY acknowledge_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employees ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, concern_description FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeConcerns ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeConcerns.employee_id WHERE concern_status = 'Open';
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments WHERE department_head IS NOT NULL;

SELECT employee_name, acknowledgement_timestamp FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeConcerns ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeConcerns.employee_id JOIN Alerts ON EmployeeConcerns.concern_id = Alerts.concern_id JOIN Acknowledgements ON Alerts.alert_id = Acknowledgements.alert_id WHERE concern_status = 'Closed';
